title: Wait, I'm confused...

replies.body: Damn! Yorick is overpowered
Tired of 5v5? Yorick now bring an extra 4 champions into the rift. Finally your enemy can get that long-awaited nonakill
On hexakill, the Legendary Decakill.
In all for one, the even more Legendary Quinvigintakill. (I think that is the numerical prefix for 25...)
You have too much time on your hands if you actually looked up the numerical prefix for 25.
It takes an entire 5 seconds.
Don't forget that the maiden can summon four more. What would 13 be?

She summons the walkers. not the graves.

http://i.imgur.com/P6ToO.gif"
But Graves is a dead man walkin'.
mmmmmm Still not good enough.
Riot heard complaints about how Graves counters melee champs, so they created a melee champ who can counter him with a single button.
Joke's on you, the summoned graves are subject to friendly fire with their shotguns.

> who can counter him

Literally, you can now identify the amount of Graves using a counter.

... I don't know about you guys, but I think Rito may have misunderstood the problem.

"Hey guys we hear you about how difficult Graves is to count, we too have difficulty with numbers over 1, so we have implemented a grave counter onto Yorick so you always know how many there are!"

"... Rito plz"
I can assume that the Black Mist is just all those Graves vape clouds then
So Yorick can literally expel and lob smoke, but Graves can't have a cigar?

Riot has confirmed Yorick X Graves.
EDIT: Yorick X Graves X Graves X Graves X Graves.

Uhh...
Kinky
dead man walkin.
Well, now we know what Doom Bot Yorick is gonna look like.
RIOT PLEASE!
If he creates graves, then he shouldn't summon mist walkers, he should summon vape walkers.
Since Graves vapes now, he can create mist walkers

Of course the summoned Graves don't have cigars.

Thx, Rito

One for all, 5 Yorick vs 5 Graves. 

Yorick presses q once,

"PENTAKILLLL"

Wait, so we can only use Yorick's full kit in One-for-All now? There can only be 2 Graves in matches that aren't draft normally. RIP the Yorick dream of having 3 or more Graves outside of One-for-All. {{item:3070}}
Nah cuz Yorick has the ability to create him.

The problem is that if they nerf it so that he only gets one Graves, they'll need to buff him elsewhere...


How about giving the Graves a cigar?
{{champion:104}} hard counter?
http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs47/i/2010/104/4/5/DON__T_QUESTION_ME_by_Psychorror.png
Wow this was so funny. *Ha ha ha ha ha*
